_header: Christ as he vouched safe himself
_description: Gospel for 22nd Sunday after Trinity, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Crist als he vowched saue himselueSpak to his desciples twelue…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …God lene vs to forgif sinþat we may his forgifnes win
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Simile est regnum celorum homini regi & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.160-165.
